div.l: She gropith alwey ferther with her hond
And fond the bed and thoght but good
Be cause that the cradil by hit stode
"~" in left margin may be correction mark.And nyst wher͗e it was for it was derk
But feir͗e and wele she crept to þe Clerk
And lyth ful stil to gete a slepe
With in a while the Clerk vp lepe
And on this good wyfe he leyd on sore
So mery a fit had she nat ful ȝore
He prikith hard and sore as he wer͗e mad
This Ioly lyfe hath these to Clerkis led
Til that the third kok began to syng
Aleyn̄ wexe wery in the dawnyng
For he had swonkyn al the long nyght
And seid fare wele Malkyn̄ swete white
The day is com̄ I may no longir bide
But evirmo where so I go or ride
I is thyn̄ own̄ Clerk so have I sel
Nowe dere lemman quod he fare wel
But or thowe go o thing I wol the tel
When̄ yee go forthe right be þe mel
Right atte entre of þe dor be hynde
Thowe shalt a kake of half a busshel fynde
That was I made of thyn̄ own̄ mele
Wich that I help my fadir for to stele
And good lemman God þe save ⁊and kepe
And with that word she gan to wepe
Aleyn vp stirt and thoght or in dawe
I wol go crepe in be my felawe
And felt the Cradil with his hond Anon̄
Be God thoght he al vrong have I gone
Myn̄ hede is toty of myn̄ swynk al nyght
That makith me that I go nat a right
